description: Schema defining a Submission to a Synapse Competition
name: Submission

id.description: The unique, immutable Synapse ID of this Submission.

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an entity is out-of-date.

userId.description: The Synapse ID of the owner of this Submission.

competitionId.description: The Synapse ID of the Competition this Submission is for.

entityId.description: The Synapse ID of the Entity in this Submission.

versionNumber.description: The version number of the Entity

name.description: The Synapse ID of the Competition this Submission is for.

createdOn.description: The date on which Submission was created.
